name: Compact Microsoft Teams for Dark theme
description:
*NOTE 16/06* I know the new "emoji reaction" is broken, will update in a few days.

Compact mode for Microsoft Teams: Use full screen width; remove name/date headers on each message; remove alternating left/right display of messages.

This customization applies to the "Dark" theme of Microsoft Teams. See other styles from me for Condensed mode and light themes.
